text: Erwin Kuffer (born 16 September 1943) is a former Luxembourgish footballer who played as a defender. ==Club career== Kuffer started his career at local team Red Boys Differdange and played in France for Lyon and in Belgium for Standard Liège. ==International career== He made his debut for Luxembourg in 1965 and went on to earn over a dozen caps.
